messages.message: In the Build App the term Semantic name is used but in the description it is not stated that the semantic name is then used as the prompt.  Only way to understand this is to hover over the Send Prompt icon.  Suggest the term prompt be used for that field name or in the description

we’ve received lots of feedback about this, and we’ll reconsider this before GA’ing field descriptions

currently you see this since field descriptions are on by default for internal users in 24.08
